details.value: 5 MP Swivel camera with integrated dual array digital microphones

details.name: Ports
details.value: 1 headphone/microphone combo, 1 USB Type-C® 20Gbps signaling rate (charging); 1 USB Type-A 10Gbps signaling rate, 1 USB Type-C® 10Gbps signaling rate (DisplayPort™ 1.4); 2 USB Type-A 10Gbps signaling rate; 2 USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate; 1 HDMI-in 1.4; 1 dual-mode DisplayPort™ 1.4; 1 RJ-45

details.name: Family positioning overview
details.value: HP EliteDesk 870 Series desktops provide businesses with powerful, expandable, highly secure, and reliable PCs designed for power users.

details.name: Features
details.value: HP Wired Desktop 320K Keyboard; Fingerprint sensor; HP Wolf Pro Security Edition (1 year); Trusted Platform Module TPM 2.0 Embedded Security Chip shipped with Windows 10 (Common Criteria EAL4+ Certified)(FIPS 140-2 Level 2 Certified); HP Sure Start; HP Secure Erase; HP Sure Click; HP Sure Sense; Absolute Persistence module; HP Sure Admin; HP BIOSphere Gen6; HP Client Security Manager Gen7; HP Tamper Lock; HP Sure Run Gen6; HP Sure Recover Gen6; HP Plarform Certificate; Seamless Firmware Update Service; Secured-COre PC Disable; Windows Hello Enhanced SIgn-in Security (ESS) Enable; Wi-Fi 6E; 1 headphone/microphone combo; Ocean-bound plastic in speaker enclosure; 40% post-consumer recycled plastic; 30% ITE-derived closed loop plastic; Low Halogen; 80 Plus® Platinum power supplies available

details.name: Feature supporting point
details.value: Work anywhere without compromising on performance or security with Windows 11 powered by HP's collaboration and connectivity technology.

details.name: Feature supporting point
details.value: Help speed up demanding business applications with the latest generation Intel® Core™ processors.

details.name: Feature supporting point
details.value: The HP Wolf Pro Security Edition provides preconfigured enterprise-level PC protection for small and medium sized businesses.

details.name: Feature supporting point
details.value: Malware is evolving rapidly beyond traditional antivirus capabilities. Protect your PC against never-before-seen attacks with HP Sure Sense, which combines behavioral analysis with advanced AI techniques to provide exceptional protection.

details.name: Feature supporting point
details.value: The portability of your PC and the reliability of a fast connection determines where you can work. Get a fast and reliable connection in dense wireless environments with gigabit-speed Wi-Fi 6.

details.name: Feature supporting point
details.value: Keep your critical applications and processes running even if malware tries to shut them down with the self-healing protection of HP Sure Run.

details.name: Feature headline
details.value: Quick and secure recovery to the latest image

details.name: Feature headline
details.value: Speed up the basics of IT management

details.name: Feature supporting point
details.value: Users can quickly and securely restore their machines to the latest image and IT can schedule reimaging for the entire fleet using only a network connection with optional HP Sure Recover.

details.name: Feature supporting point
details.value: Help protect your PC from websites and read only Microsoft Office and PDF attachments with embedded malware, ransomware, or viruses with hardware-enforced security from HP Sure Click.

details.name: Feature supporting point
details.value: Deploy the HP Manageability Integration Kit to help speed up image creation and the management of hardware, BIOS, and security when managing devices through Microsoft Endpoint Manager.

details.name: Flex value prop 1 supporting point
details.value: HP has included recycled content into over 95% of new PCs and Displays since 2020.

details.name: Flex value prop 2 supporting point
details.value: HP Wolf Security is a hardware-enforced, resilient defense that provides protection from cyber attacks.

details.name: Flex value prop 3 supporting point
details.value: HP Elite and Dragonfly families: Security, manageability, and style for wherever work happens.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [8] DDR5 memory modules support data transfer rates up to 5600 MT/s on i5-14600, i7-14700, and i9-14900 processors. All other processors support up to 4800 MT/s, following Intel’s design guideline. Actual data rate is determined by the system configuration.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [9] All memory slots are customer accessible / upgradeable.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [10] For storage drives, GB = 1 billion bytes. TB = 1 trillion bytes. Actual formatted capacity is less. Up to 30 GB (for Windows) of disk is reserved for system recovery software.

details.value: [11] Sold separately or as an optional feature.

details.value: [14] HP Manageability Integration Kit can be downloaded from http://www.hp.com/go/clientmanagement.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [16] HP Quick Drop requires Internet access and Windows 10 or higher PC preinstalled with HP QuickDrop app and either an Android device (phone or tablet) running Android 7 or higher with the Android HP QuickDrop app, and /or an iOS device (phone or tablet) running iOS 12 or higher with the iOS HP QuickDrop app.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [17] HP Support Assistant requires Windows and Internet access.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [18] HP Smart Support automatically collects the telemetry necessary upon initial boot of the product to deliver device-level configuration data and health insights and is available preinstalled on select products, thru HP Factory Configuration Services; or it can be downloaded. For more information about how to enable HP Smart Support or for download, please visit http://www.hp.com/smart-support .

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [19] HP Sure Click requires Windows 10 Pro or higher or Enterprise. See https://bit.ly/2PrLT6A_SureClick for complete details.

details.value: [20] HP Sure Sense is available on select HP PCs with Windows 10 Pro, Windows 10 Enterprise, Windows 11 Pro, or Windows 11 Enterprise OS.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [21] HP Sure Run Gen5 is available on select HP PCs and requires Windows 10 and higher.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [22] HP Sure Recover Gen5 with Embedded Reimaging is an optional feature which requires Windows 10 and higher must be configured at purchase. details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [23] HP Sure Start Gen7 is available on select HP PCs and requires Windows 10 and higher.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [33] Starting from November 1st 2023, all shipments will require Windows to be installed on SSD to provide users a better experience. HDD can only be configured as additional data drives and not the boot drive.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [34] Wireless access point and internet service required and sold separately. Availability of public wireless access points limited. Wi-Fi 6 is backwards compatible with prior 802.11 specs.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [35] The HP 800 G9 All-in-one requires Intel® 13th Gen processor to support Wi-Fi 6E and requires a Wi-Fi 6E router, sold separately, to function in the 6GHz band. Availability of public wireless access points limited. Wi-Fi 6E is backwards compatible with prior 802.11 specs. Available in countries where Wi-Fi 6E is supported. For HP 800 G9 All-in-one without Intel® 13th Gen processors, the product does not support Wi-Fi 6E standard and does not operate under 6GHz band. The product is compatible with 6GHz and other routers, sold separately, which have capability to operate in 2.4GHz and 5GHz, in compliance with Wi-Fi 6 and prior 802.11 specs. The actual throughput depends on network condition and router configuration. Internet service required and public wireless access points are limited.add:Wireless access point and Internet service required and sold separately. Availability of public wireless access points limited. Wi-Fi 7 (802.11BE) functionality requires Windows 11 2024, Intel ® Core ™ 14th gen processors, and a Wi-Fi 7 router, sold separately. Wi-Fi 7 is backwards compatible with prior 802.11 specs. Available in countries where Wi-Fi 7 is supported.  The specification for 802.11BE is a draft specification and is not final.  If the final specification differs from the draft specification, it may affect the ability of the device to communicate with other 802.11BE devices.

details.name: Tech spec footnote 56
details.value: [56] This product includes a one (1) year license of HP Wolf Pro Security Edition which includes HP Sure Click Pro and HP Sure Sense Pro. The HP Wolf Pro Security Edition software is licensed under the license terms of the HP End User License Agreement (EULA) that can be found at: https://support.hp.com/us-en/document/ish_3875769-3873014-16 as modified by the following: “7. Term. Unless otherwise terminated earlier pursuant to the terms contained in this EULA, the license for the HP Wolf Pro Security Edition (HP Sure Sense Pro and HP Sure Click Pro) is effective upon activation and will continue for twelve (12) months thereafter (“Initial Term”). At the end of the Initial Term you may either (a) purchase a renewal license for the HP Wolf Pro Security Edition from HP.com, HP Sales or an HP Channel Partner, or (b) continue using the standard versions of HP Sure Click and HP Sure Sense at no additional cost with no future software updates or HP Support.”

details.name: Key selling point
details.value: Bring your meetings to life powered by premium audio and video features.[4]

details.name: Key selling point
details.value: Multitask with ease thanks the latest Intel® processor2, massive storage, and agile DDR5 memory.

details.name: Key selling point
details.value: HP Wolf Security for Business creates a hardware-enforced, always-on, resilient defense.[6]

details.name: Key selling point
details.value: At least 50 percent of all plastic used in this PC is post-consumer recycled plastic.[7]

details.name: Legal tagline
details.value: HP recommends Windows 11 Pro for business

details.name: Audio
details.value: Audio by Bang & Olufsen, 5 W stereo speakers, headset and headphone side ports (3.5 mm), high performance integrated stereo speakers

details.name: Processor
details.value: Intel® Core™ i5-14500 (up to 5.0 GHz with Intel® Turbo Boost Technology, 24 MB L3 cache, 14 cores, 20 threads)

details.name: Overview
details.value: The HP EliteOne 870 AiO empowers your team to be at their best with experiences that delight users and IT. Featuring a new sleek design, the latest Intel® processor[2], and packed with a new set of premium collaboration tools, it’s ready for all your demanding projects and virtual conferences.

details.name: Overview
details.value: Be there even when you’re not

details.name: Product description for SEO
details.value: One of the best high-performance AiO desktops for collaboration and demanding workloads from HP.
